Use this notebook to quickly write the methods for the week:

Raw reads were inspected using FastQC (). 
The raw reads were then quality controlled with Trimmomatic (0.39) using the arguments 'ILLUMINACLIP:TruSeq3-SE.fa:2:30:10 LEADING:3 TRAILING:3 SLIDINGWINDOW:4:15'. 
`Bowtie2-build` () was used to build a genome index for human genome GRCh38
